title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 2  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 2  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason debate whether or not Aaron Rodgers will continue to play and with what team. Senior NFL Writer for Yahoo! Sports Charles Robinson joins the guys to talk about Rodgers and the main headlines coming off of the Super Bowl. Doug and Jason talk about the details in a new book that exposes some of the darker sides of Mike Krzyzewski and how he has handled his succession at Duke.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
